channel.title: I Just Do Things
channel.description: Recent content on I Just Do Things

item.title: New Blog, Who Dis?
item.description: New Blog, Who Dis? Link to heading It’s a question that we’ve all asked at some point in our lives - whether we’re starting a new job, moving to a new city, or embarking on a new adventure. And it’s a question that I’m asking myself today, as I sit down to write my first post for this brand new blog. My name is Nathaniel Evry, and I’m a passionate technologist with a diverse set of skills and a love for innovation.

About Me Link to heading Greetings! I’m Nathaniel Evry, a passionate technologist with a diverse set of skills and a love for innovation. With years of experience in the tech industry, I’ve built and implemented software systems for a variety of clients and projects. Currently, I serve as the Chief Research Officer at quub, a small aerospace startup. In this role, I bring my knowledge of miniaturized electronics, signal transmission and reception, hardware design, coding, architecture, and research to the table.
